title: Blender 2D Animation Basics for Beginners - Grease pencil guide
description:
Learn how to create stunning 2D animations in Blender with this quick Grease Pencil tutorial! I'll walk you through the basics, from sketching to animating a Ghibli-style frog. Whether you're new to Blender or just looking to sharpen your skills, this video has everything you need to start bringing your 2D art to life!
